name: Tasty Jigsaw. Happy Hour 3
description:
What will you eat? We have fresh cakes and delicate ice cream, juicy burgers and hearty breakfasts, dinner parties and romantic dinners for you. No need to wash your hands before the game!

In the game you customize the level of difficulty, a large number of hints when assembling a puzzle, as well as the ability to save progress and continue the game at any time. Beginners and experienced players alike will find fun in this puzzle game!

- 500 high quality pictures
- an elaborate game mode with handy hints, sorting and a magnifying glass
- individual setting of each puzzle complexity, allowing you to play an infinite number of times
- Possibility to turn off the rotation mode of puzzle pieces
- function of saving and resuming the process of assembling a puzzle at any time
- Colorful trophies to consolidate your success
